originalText.text: My 10 year old daughter Yessenia has been a little talent in training with PPA since she was just 4 years old! üòä My niece and Goddaughter have also joined since the beginning‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs by the grace of God we were able to find such a dynamic program with instructors equipped with such skill and a professionally trained background training our youth! üôèüåπ The best part is that it‚Äôs a diverse program with instructors who all seem to have a heart of Gold and each one gives their heart and soul to our kids by fostering their talents with fierce dedication! ‚ù§Ô∏è As a parent you want to expose your child to the best talent training available and most of us are willing to go broke doing it! PPA can appreciate the struggle of a working parent and are not out to break our piggy banks! üôè Most importantly, I can attest to the fact that PPA has provided my child with jewels money just can‚Äôt buy‚Ä¶ *confidence, self-esteem, discipline, ambition, self pride and a skill set that fosters a special appreciation for the arts! ü©∞ üåπ I can certainly appreciate the wonderful group outings to shows of the arts that have also helped to foster comrade amongst the talents in trainings and love that they seem more like a second family! ü§ó Cheers to the best kept secret in Harlem! ‚ù§Ô∏è A fabulous and innovative program, i am so humbled and honored for this blessing‚Ä¶ Quality of the team reflects leadership‚Ä¶ Thank You Ms. Nina (Founder) and Mr. Emilio (Creative Dir) who always stay engaged and have their ears to the ground‚Ä¶ kudos to our PPA team for a job well done! ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüëØ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüëëüíØüéàüåπüéäüëèüëç Thank you for lifting our babies up! ‚ù§Ô∏è

text.text: My 10 year old daughter Yessenia has been a little talent in training with PPA since she was just 4 years old! üòä My niece and Goddaughter have also joined since the beginning‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs by the grace of God we were able to find such a dynamic program with instructors equipped with such skill and a professionally trained background training our youth! üôèüåπ The best part is that it‚Äôs a diverse program with instructors who all seem to have a heart of Gold and each one gives their heart and soul to our kids by fostering their talents with fierce dedication! ‚ù§Ô∏è As a parent you want to expose your child to the best talent training available and most of us are willing to go broke doing it! PPA can appreciate the struggle of a working parent and are not out to break our piggy banks! üôè Most importantly, I can attest to the fact that PPA has provided my child with jewels money just can‚Äôt buy‚Ä¶ *confidence, self-esteem, discipline, ambition, self pride and a skill set that fosters a special appreciation for the arts! ü©∞ üåπ I can certainly appreciate the wonderful group outings to shows of the arts that have also helped to foster comrade amongst the talents in trainings and love that they seem more like a second family! ü§ó Cheers to the best kept secret in Harlem! ‚ù§Ô∏è A fabulous and innovative program, i am so humbled and honored for this blessing‚Ä¶ Quality of the team reflects leadership‚Ä¶ Thank You Ms. Nina (Founder) and Mr. Emilio (Creative Dir) who always stay engaged and have their ears to the ground‚Ä¶ kudos to our PPA team for a job well done! ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüëØ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüëëüíØüéàüåπüéäüëèüëç Thank you for lifting our babies up! ‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text: Project Performing Arts(PPA) is an affordable dance school, located in the heart of Harlem. You just don't dance at PPA. The children learn the history of the dances and the rhythm when it comes to drumming. They also learn dance and drumming techniques. I have been sending my three boys for 9 years. Between them, they have taken up ballet, tap, African dance, hip-hop, bucket drumming, and African drumming. As a dance mom, I have also taken and adult dance classes at PPA. My sons love PPA and so do I. It is a family oriented organization which mean, when you send you child to PPA the director Mrs. Nina as well as the instructors  become your family. I recommend  Project Performing Arts to everyone.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

text.text: Project Performing Arts(PPA) is an affordable dance school, located in the heart of Harlem. You just don't dance at PPA. The children learn the history of the dances and the rhythm when it comes to drumming. They also learn dance and drumming techniques. I have been sending my three boys for 9 years. Between them, they have taken up ballet, tap, African dance, hip-hop, bucket drumming, and African drumming. As a dance mom, I have also taken and adult dance classes at PPA. My sons love PPA and so do I. It is a family oriented organization which mean, when you send you child to PPA the director Mrs. Nina as well as the instructors  become your family. I recommend  Project Performing Arts to everyone.‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text: We absolutely love this Dance studio. The staff is very friendly and talented and pay close attention to the needs of your children. They are loving and push your children to the fullest potential while encouraging them to be the best version of themselves. The staff treat the parents and students as family and even encourage parents to join. I highly recommend Project Performing Arts you won't be disappointed

text.text: We absolutely love this Dance studio. The staff is very friendly and talented and pay close attention to the needs of your children. They are loving and push your children to the fullest potential while encouraging them to be the best version of themselves. The staff treat the parents and students as family and even encourage parents to join. I highly recommend Project Performing Arts you won't be disappointed

originalText.text: Having Project Performing Arts as a space for my daughter to be introduced to Dance at the age of 6 years old has been a blessing! Ms. Nina was also my Dance Director many years ago. Her passion to build a community/family through the arts is something so special, it lives in your soul for a lifetime! Thank you for continuing this legacy and looking forward to enrolling Jalen again in the Fall 2023!

text.text: Having Project Performing Arts as a space for my daughter to be introduced to Dance at the age of 6 years old has been a blessing! Ms. Nina was also my Dance Director many years ago. Her passion to build a community/family through the arts is something so special, it lives in your soul for a lifetime! Thank you for continuing this legacy and looking forward to enrolling Jalen again in the Fall 2023!

originalText.text: Having the opportunity to be last year's Team Leader for Project Performing Arts was an amazing experience; not only for me, but for every single child that took part! PPA truly gave every child, parents, staff and the instructors a new mindset of the different arts and culture around them. Through variety of dance sessions, arts & crafts, learning acting, improvisation, theater games and much more! After working with them for 6 weeks, I saw great growth in each child; allowing them to expand their mind and soul. I strongly recommend the program to everyone!! Definitely an unforgettable experience.

text.text: Having the opportunity to be last year's Team Leader for Project Performing Arts was an amazing experience; not only for me, but for every single child that took part! Through variety of dance sessions, arts & crafts, learning acting, improvisation, theater games and much more! After working with them for 6 weeks, I saw great growth in each child; allowing them to expand their mind and soul. I strongly recommend the program to everyone!! Definitely an unforgettable experience.
